attributes.action: Prevent Co-op demolishing Lord Nelson Public House in Morton, Lincolnshire
attributes.additional_details: As residents of Morton, Hanthorpe & surrounding villages, we wish to object against, and to petition the South Keteven District Council, on the proposal by the Co-op, to demolish the Lord Nelson public house and erect a store, on the grounds that it will cause congestion on the A15 and increase the dangers to road users, pedestrians, school children and residents.
